data.name: Uni Live Viewer
data.description:
This is a VR live viewer application that allows you to easily check out dance performances by anime-style characters.
You can decorate items and enjoy double speed dancing.
Vroid simple load and pass-through functions have also been added.
※Currently, the application will not start without "Allow file access" at startup.
※Please summon in the playback state, as there is a problem of misalignment during playback if summoned in the stopped state.

If you have a PC, you can further customize the live performance by loading VRM models, VMD dances, and music files.
→For detailed instructions, please check the official website or readme.txt in the app's dedicated folder.

The app is still under development, various updates are planned at irregular intervals.

translations.long_description:
Candy Rock Starのライブステージで、好みのユニティちゃんのダンスを眺めることができます。
好きなタイミングで止めたり、倍速ダンスも楽しめます。
Viewerシーンでは複数のモデルを確認できます。

現在は非常にシンプルな機能しかありません、今後アップデートで様々な機能を追加予定です。
translations.short_description: ユニティちゃんのライブステージをお手軽に確認できるツールです。

changelog.change_log:
v0.6.9a [Jun. 09, 2022]（Early Access for v0.7.0）
 Gym stage added, one trial dance added.
 Trial Passthrough function added
 Added manual book (removed "?" button on UI) 
 Added the ability to copy VRMs from the download folder (Vroid can now be loaded without a PC)
 Item page tabs divided, items added and coloring method changed
 Reorganized configuration screen UI, added options (mainly VMD-related)
 Shadows added to character's feet, footsteps added to some stages
 Improved LookAt eyes (more natural gaze) 
 Fixed a bug that caused SEs to go out of control due to interference with SSU swaying objects and items.
 Added slow and fast character expansion/contraction speeds
 Magic circle design change,KAGURA Stage Enlarge
 Changed to start from the previous scene after the title screen 

v0.6.9 [April. 23, 2022]
 Changed from VRM material adjustment screen to preset editing screen
 Improvement of material anomalies in VRM
 Fixed a bug that caused VRM springbone to load in an abnormal state.
 Fine-tuning of facial expressions during VMD playback, load balancing during initial loading
 Addressing a problem with not proceeding from the loading screen.（Output error messages about VMD）
 Fixed a bug where the sonic boom in the CRS stage was not working.

v0.6.8 [April. 09, 2022] ※Please see the notice above.
 VMD Improvement
 The UI will follow you.
 Load balancing during character selection and summoning
 Fixed a bug that caused VRM meshes to disappear part by part.

v0.6.9a [Jun. 09, 2022]（Early Access for v0.7.0）

v0.6.9 [2022/04/23] 
-VRMのマテリアル調整画面→プリセット編集画面に変更
-VRMのマテリアル異常の改善（変更に伴い一時的に透明系は不透明になっています）
-VRMの揺れ物が異常な状態でロードされる不具合の修正
-VMD再生時の表情の微調整、初回読み込み時の負荷分散
-ロード画面から進まない不具合の対応（VMDに関するエラーメッセージを出力）
-CRSステージのソニックブームが動いていなかった不具合の修正

v0.6.8 [2022/04/09] ※readme.txtのお知らせをご確認ください。
-VMD改善
-UIを追従するように変更
-キャラクター選択・召喚時の負荷分散
-VRMのメッシュがパーツ毎に消えてしまっていた不具合の修正

v0.6.7 [2022/03/26]
-各フォルダの読み込み仕様の変更
-音楽をストリーミング読み込みに変更
-モデルの削除系ボタンの追加、UIフォント整備
-メモリリークしていた問題の修正
-v0.6.6で再発していた不具合の修正
